# Available Options

Options can be set with `options()` and change the default behavior of tinytable. You can either set them in a script (usually at the top) or via `.Rprofile`. Note that you want to [be cautious](https://rstats.wtf/r-startup.html) with putting things in `.Rprofile` since they might make results not reproducible (e.g. if you change `tinytable_format_digits` in `.Rprofile`, the table will be formatted differently).

## Global options

There are a set of global options that you can change. See `?tt()` for details. These are: 

`tinytable_quarto_disable_processing`, `tinytable_html_mathjax`, `tinytable_save_pdf_clean`, `tinytable_save_pdf_engine`.

## Default values for function arguments

The rest of the options are function specific and start with `tinytable_X_` where X is `tt`/`format`/`print`/`theme`. See the corresponding help documentation for the what the argument looks like. 

### `tt()`

`tinytable_tt_digits`, `tinytable_tt_caption`, `tinytable_tt_notes`,  `tinytable_tt_width`, `tinytable_tt_theme`, `tinytable_tt_rownames`

### `format_tt()`

`tinytable_format_bool`, `tinytable_format_date`, `tinytable_format_digits`, `tinytable_format_escape`, `tinytable_format_fn`, `tinytable_format_markdown`, `tinytable_format_num_fmt`, `tinytable_format_num_mark_big`, `tinytable_format_num_mark_dec`, `tinytable_format_num_suffix`, `tinytable_format_num_zero`, `tinytable_format_other`, `tinytable_format_quarto`, `tinytable_format_replace`, `tinytable_format_sprintf`

### `print.tinytable()`

`tinytable_print_output`

### `theme_tt()`

`tinytable_theme_hlines`, `tinytable_theme_float_placement`, `tinytable_theme_horizontal_placement`, `tinytable_theme_resize_width`, `tinytable_theme_resize_direction`, 
`tinytable_theme_multipage_rowhead`, `tinytable_theme_multipage_rowfoot`, 
`tinytable_theme_tabular_style`, `tinytable_theme_siunitx_format`
